bibl.title: Heraclitus in P. Derveni.
bibl.note: P. Derveni col. I, lines 1-11 [edd.: Kyriakos Tsantsanoglou and George M. Par√°ssoglou, Heraclitus in the Derveni Papyrus, Aristoxenica, Menandrea, Fragmenta philosophica (Firenze, 1988) pp. 125-133 et pl. IV]. Text (with supplements and emendations), translation. General remarks on col. I and Heraclitus quotation. Textual notes to lines 1-11.
Lebedev A.V., Heraclitus in P. Derveni.
